CustomField.formula:
"+ " & CASE(LEN(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c)), 1, TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c),
2, TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c),
3, TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c),
4, LEFT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 1) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 3),
5, LEFT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 2) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 3),
6, LEFT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(NextBonusLevelForCalc__c), 3), null) & " Kƒç"
CustomField.label: Next Bonus Level
